examples.korean: This genus of plants differentiates into many species. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 속(屬)의 식물은 많은 종(種)으로 분화한다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This genus of plants differentiates into many species. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Emperor penguins are the largest of the penguin species. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 황제 펭귄은 펭귄 종(種) 중에서 가장 크다. Neungyule
examples.english: Emperor penguins are the largest of the penguin species. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The Panda bear has been on the endangered species list since 1984. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 팬더곰은 1984년 이후로 멸종 위기 종(種) 목록에 올라 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: The Panda bear has been on the endangered species list since 1984. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: On the origin of Species 듣기 Add to Wordbook 「종(種)의 기원에 관하여」(C.R. Darwin이 1859년 출판한 저서 이름). Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: On the origin of Species Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The sun bear, the smallest type of bear in the world, was recently named a threatened species. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세계에서 가장 작은 곰 종류 중의 하나인 태양곰은 최근 멸종 위기종(種)으로 지정되었다. Neungyule
examples.english: The sun bear, the smallest type of bear in the world, was recently named a threatened species. Add to Wordbook
